title: Luxury Town houses and Single Homes
property_details: With the increasing demand for quality accommodation in and around Colombo, ‘OPAL RESIDENCIES’ offering a modern luxury boutique development with only 19 houses in 01 Acre land. (Right next to CINEC Campus)

We have beautifully designed, luxurious 03 / 04 bedroom town houses (3,500 sq.ft.+) and Single Homes in 10 Perch land, built to highest quality, situated close to Malabe town, highway entrance (1km) at a convenient location with many public & private institutions.
All our Townhouses are built to the highest quality with German / European fittings and expert finishes handpicked to suit elegant and modern living.
Fully fitted kitchen with high-quality appliances
Complete Bathrooms with European branded fittings
We offer many in-house facilities for all our residents;
The Best Price in the Market!
We also have 02 single houses (4,500 Sq.Ft+) with 06 rooms (04 bedrooms and 02 multi purpose rooms) available for immediate sale. Prices starting from Rs. 42 Million upwards.
All these houses have same features mentioned above.
